title: New: J£ZUS MILLION – No Progress
body:
When I’m not harking on about young beatmakers needing to change up the game, I’m ranting about how brilliant **J£ZUS MILLION** is, one of the few young producers really making a lasting impression.

Taking from his debut EP expected later this year entitled Eat Dat, _No Progress_ is a glitterbug of a track, rolling handclaps and mindfucks all round. How long before a **Wacka** or a **Lil’ B** comes a calling? Surely it’s only a matter of time.
